remarks:
Negated disjunction in terms of conjunction (De Morgan's law).  Compare Theorem *4.56 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.) 

---

 Negated disjunction in terms of conjunction.  This version of DeMorgan's law is a biconditional for all propositions (not just decidable ones), unlike ~ oranim , ~ anordc , or ~ ianordc .  Compare Theorem *4.56 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2015.)
